    • Method Detail

      • getFlatProducts

        public Response getFlatProducts(Context context,
                                int flatID,
                                int userID,
                                int filter,
                                int page,
                                int pageSize)
        Returns products within given flat
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        flatID - ID of user's flat with statistics
        filter - choose one predefined filter
        page - result's page number
        pageSize - number of elements per page
        userID - ID of user (can be null or 0 for all users)
        Returns:
        Response object with List of Product objects
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - retrieved
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - can't check others' flats stats
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • removeFromMainList

        public Response removeFromMainList(Context context,
                                   Product product)
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product to be deleted
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - deleted
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - already deleted/ product not found
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - removing other user's product
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • updateProduct

        public Response updateProduct(Context context,
                              Product product)
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product with updated info
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - updated
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - product not found
        - MESSAGE_CONFLICT - somebody already updated after Product has been loaded
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - updating other user's product
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • addProduct

        public Response addProduct(Context context,
                           Product product,
                           int flatID)
        Adds product to flat's main list
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product to be added
        flatID - ID of a flat with a list
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - added
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • reserveProduct

        public Response reserveProduct(Context context,
                               Product product)
        Reserves given product for current user
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product to reserve
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - reserved
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - product not found
        - MESSAGE_CONFLICT - somebody already reserved after Product has been loaded
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • buyProduct

        public Response buyProduct(Context context,
                           Product product)
        Buys given product for current user. If it wasn't in user's list - moves it.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product to buy
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - bought
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - product not found
        - MESSAGE_CONFLICT - somebody already bought after Product has been loaded
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • unreserveProduct

        public Response unreserveProduct(Context context,
                                 Product product)
        Reserves given product for current user
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product to reserve
        Returns:
        Response object ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - unreserved
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - product not found
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • cancelBuy

        public Response cancelBuy(Context context,
                          Product product)
        Cancels buy of a given product
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        product - Product to cancel
        Returns:
        Response object ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - cancelled
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - product not found
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized
